page.text: de Vence MAGAZINE GUIDE TO VENCE Fashion QUICKGUIDE

Introduction No matter what type of gift or Provençale souvenir you would like to buy, you will find it in a shop here. But do not ignore the many other small boutiques selling everything from antiques, through to high fashion clothing. This link icon will take you to individual websites for each establishment. To download the newest version of our Magazine click on this icon. Fashion QUICKGUIDE Click here to return to Vence Magazine

Boutique SO’HOM offers a large selection of clothing, shoes and accessories by Esprit and jeans by Freeman T Porter. Maryse Desreumaux looks forward to welcoming you to her shop. 4, rue de Peyra - 06140 Vence Téléphone: 04 93 58 65 44 9h00-12h00/15h00-19h00. Sunday, Monday closed. So Hom Adresse 134 Avenue Emile Hugues 06140 Vence, France

10h00-13h00/14h30-18h30. Sunday closed. La Boutique de Gigi 140 Vence, France - Google Maps Adresse 36 Avenue Marcellin Maurel 06140 Vence, France 9/17/13 6:57 AM “The shop Gigi” offers trendy branded clothing, including French designer collections, at affordable prices: Bride of the Mekong, Lili soon, Odemaï .... Ethnic, chic or classic styles of bags, leather shoes and jewellery for men and women. A warm and inviting shop. Qualified image consultant. 34 ave Marcelin Maurel - 06140 Vence Téléphone: 09 80 57 75 56

With a combination of elegance and trendy casual, Outfit welcomes you to discover its universe of brands: Pablo by Gérard Darel, Pennyblack by Maxmara, Paul & Joe, Majestic, Was, Spring Court, and many more... 1, rue du Peyra- 06140 Vence Téléphone: +33 (0)4 93 59 82 25 E-Mail: beadurand@numericable.fr 10h00-13h00/14h30-18h30. Sunday closed. Outfit

0930h00-19h00. Sunday 10h30-12h30. C.C.D.K. Designer brands clothing: Icode de Ikks; Rinascimento, Elisa Cavaletti and Riviere de Lune. Shoes: Neosens, Minka, Virus Moda. Bags, belts, jewellery. 25, avenue Marcellin Maurel - 06140 Vence Téléphone: +33 (0) 4 93 23 77 49 E-Mail: mindaskl.vence@yahoo.fr

This boutique is dedicated entirely to creators of silver and costume jewellery, and prêt-à-porter clothing. Come and discover a universe of delicate lace and accessories at reasonable prices (Catylesca, E-bryde, Sunlight, etc) 9 ave de la Résistance - 06140 Vence Téléphone: +33 (0)4 93 24 61 36 10h30-12h30/15h00-19h30. Sunday, Monday closed. L’Envol

09h30-13h00/ 14h30-19h00. Sunday 10h00-13h00. Monday closed. Femmes A. Hôtel Spa & Restaurant Cantemerle 258, chemin Cantemerle, 06140 Vence ​ 04 93 58 08 18 ​ 3 avis €€€ Prix convertis selon le taux de change actuel - Clause de non- responsabilité 258 chemin cantemerle, vence, france Shop in a welcoming atmosphere, for inexpensive clothes similar to the designer brands in French sizes 38 to 54 and over. Accessories, handbags, leather articles. 6, rue du Marché - 06140 Vence Téléphone: +33 (0)4 93 11 04 12 Email: femmes.vence@gmail.com

Original fashionable clothing for everyone, including a large choice of high-waist jeans, belts and handbags. For the past two years we have stocked shoes by “Les Petites Bombes” at very affordable prices. 42, ave Marcelin Maurel - 06140 Vence Téléphone: +33 (0)4 93 58 20 16 E-Mail: info@agencelacanopee.co 9h00-12h15/15h00-19h00. Monday closed. Caroline

09h00-19h00/ 15h00-19h00. Sunday and Monday closed. Lorenzo A. Hôtel Spa & Restaurant Cantemerle 258, chemin Cantemerle, 06140 Vence ​ 04 93 58 08 18 ​ 3 avis €€€ Prix convertis selon le taux de change actuel - Clause de non- responsabilité 258 chemin cantemerle, vence, france Watches by Seiko, Rodania, Guess, Casio. Jewellery by Tisento, Guess We manufacture, alter and repair. 9, ave de la Résistance - 06140 Vence Téléphone: +33 (0)4 93 58 36 14

An exceptionally intimate and cosy atmosphere. Select Italian and French collections in all sizes (from S to XXL). Hats, handbags, accessories... 6, rue de l’Evêché - 06140 Vence Téléphone: +33 (0) 4 93 59 32 76 E-Mail: contact@leboudoir-bydc.fr Le Boudoir by DC 10h00-19h30/Sunday closed.

09h30-12h30/ 15h00-19h00. Sunday 09h30-12h30. Monday closed. Les Nouveautés Parisiennes Adresse 13 Place du Peyra 06140 Vence, France “Les Nouveautés Parisiennes” is the oldest shop in Vence. Located in the heart of the old town, 3 place du Peyra, the shop has kept the spirit and charm of traditional values and offers the best choice ofquality shoes and the finest hats for the demanding customers of today. Click above to see our offerings ! 3, Place du Peyra- 06140 Vence Téléphone: +33 (0)4 93 58 04 49 www.nouveautesparisiennesvence.eu

Prêt-à-porter and accessories. The “must” in Vence - elegant, flowing, feminine. 10, ave Marcelin Maurel - 06140 Vence Téléphone: +33 (0)6 02 23 63 64 E-Mail: hanswiltschut01@gmail.com Season: 9h00-13h00/16h00-19h00. Sundau 10h00-13h00. Le Diamant Noir Adresse 10 Avenue Marcellin Maurel 06140 Vence, France

0830h00-19h00. Open after 19h00 on reservation. Matild'Asie Adresse 1 Place Godeau 06140 Vence, France woccasions: Vietnamese crafts; lacquered bottle carriers; water pipes; dolls; silk shawls and kimonos; Cashmere creations; taffeta reversible jackets (sizes from S to 4XL); velvet jackets; satin, coats, tunics - colours and aromas from abroad. 1, place Godeau - 06140 Vence Téléphone: +33 (0) 6 16 47 88 67 E-Mail: matildasie@hotmail.fr

Located in the heart of the old town, we sell Provençal speciality fabric homewares, and lingerie: Playtex, Won- derbra, Triumph. Open on Monday during summer. 14, place George Clémenceau - 06140 Vence Téléphone: +33 (0)4 93 24 06 52 E-Mail: warmegysre@hotmail.fr 9h00-12h00/14h30-19h00. Au Fil d’Argent Adresse 10 Place Clemenceau 06140 Vence, France

0830h00-19h00. Open after 19h00 on reservation. Sportman A. Hôtel Spa & Restaurant Cantemerle 258, chemin Cantemerle, 06140 Vence ​ 04 93 58 08 18 ​ 3 avis €€€ Prix convertis selon le taux de change actuel - Clause de non- responsabilité 258 chemin cantemerle, vence, france Ready-to-wear clothing and shoes for gentlemen who love style. Marlboro, Camel, Lacoste.... 7, ave de la Résistance - 06140 Vence Téléphone: +33 (0)4 93 24 63 47

Toxic, everything for women – smiles and advice guaranteed! Off the peg clothing, shoes, handbags and accessories. Specialist in jewellery for piercings (ear, nose, bellybutton, etc). 22, place Antony Mars - 06140 Vence Téléphone: +33 (0)4 89 08 18 64 E-Mail: steph@toxic-vence.fr facebook.com/pages/toxic 9h00-12h00/14h30-19h00. Toxic

0830h00-19h00. Open after 19h00 on reservation. Les Enfants Terribles Adresse 25 Avenue Marcellin Maurel 06140 Vence, France Clothing boutique for children from 3 months to 12 years old. Accessories, shoes etc from Lili Gaufrette, Catimini, Interdit De Me Gronder, La Petite Ourse, Reqins. 23 ave Marcelin Maurel - 06140 Vence Téléphone: +33 (0)4 93 58 04 98

Sun, Smiles and Shopping with Marie Claude who happily introduces you to clothing brands: La Fée Maraboutée, Mais il est ou le soleil, Créa Concept, Myrine and me, Soya concept... as well as gifts, bears and dolls. Qualified Image consultancy by appointment, alone or with a friend. 16, Place du Grand Jardin- 06140 Vence Téléphone: 9h00-12h00/14h30-19h00. Tutti Quanti

09h00-19h00/ 15h00-19h00. Sunday and Monday closed. Jardin’s Secret’s A. Hôtel Spa & Restaurant Cantemerle 258, chemin Cantemerle, 06140 Vence ​ 04 93 58 08 18 ​ 3 avis €€€ Prix convertis selon le taux de change actuel - Clause de non- responsabilité Jardins secret’s “Underwear is close to a woman’s soul” Karine welcomes you with a smile to her garden of secrets to unveil the pleasures of Prima Donna, Marie Jo, Wacoal, Lejaby, Pain de Sucre and Antigel ... the quality and sophistication of French brands, in all cup sizes. 14, place du Grand Jardin - 06140 Vence Téléphone: 04 93 59 94 24 258 chemin cantemerle, vence, france

The boutique ‘diabologum’ brings a little freshness of mind to multi-brand ready-to-wear clothing for men, women and children, as well as home decor and gift ideas. Frequent new arrivals in a relaxed friendly atmosphere, with winks to the stars of yesterday and today in light easy-to-wear fashion.. 44, ave Marcelin Maurel - 06140 Vence Téléphone: +33 (0)4 89 22 36 21 10h00-13h00/15h00-19h00. Sunday : 10h00-13h00. Monday closed. diabologum 44-46 Avenue Marcellin Maurel, 06140 Vence, France - Google Maps 9/17/13 6:45 AM Adresse 46 Avenue Marcellin Maurel 06140 Vence, France

09h00-13h00/ 14h30-19h00. Sunday, Monday closed. Cover Me the Shop Adresse 9 Avenue de la Résistance 06140 Vence, France Urban-spirit clothing for ladies and men. Tastefully chic and fashionable brands like Skunk Funk, Ben Sherman, Solid, Lavand. Stylish accessories by My Wallit. Sterling silver and natural gemstone jewellery by French designers. Style is not merely important - it is everything! 9, ave de la Résistance - 06140 Vence Téléphone: +33 (0) 6 62 48 12 66 E-Mail: guiotgilles@gmail.com

10h00-13h00/15h00-19h00. Sunday : 10h00-13h00. Monday closed. Friendly Florentine will clothe your children (from birth to 16 years) in original styles and unique ensembles. New collections arrive frequently. 6, rue de l’Eveche - 06140 Vence Téléphone: +33 (0)4 89 03 30 19 Florentine Adresse 6 Rue de l'Évêché 6 Rue de l'Évêché 06140 Vence, France

All about the icons Shopping No matter what type of gift or Provençale souvenir you would like to buy, you will find it in a shop here. Hotels and Other Accomodation If you are searching for superior comfort or a budget “bed and breakfast” you will find an accomodation to suit you here. Restaurants FASHION HOTELS SOUVENIRS DELICATESSEN GUEST HOUSES CAMPING Vence’s restaurants cater for every taste and pocket - from inexpensive “plat du jour” of local produce to exotic flavours from other lands or gourmet adventures. Cafes Vence’s many cafes are ideal places to relax and watch the world go by, to meet and chat to residents or other tourists, or plan your next excursion. Real Estate Agents See how real people live on the Côte d’Azur by visiting sales properties with a choice of Real Estate Agents. Perhaps your visit will prove a good financial investment. Services Banks, pharmacies, and if you can’t find what you’re looking for, it is probably listed here. Galleries SERVICES FINANCE TAKE-AWAY The “City of Arts” is home to many galleries. Each has its own theme, special artist or style of work. Some are hidden in interesting untravelled corners of the city. Beauty Whether tempted to try a new look or merely smartening up for a special evening out, Vence’s beauty parlours and hairdressers are at your service. Places Museums, Parks, Miscellaneous sites worth seeing...
